  • How to Install and Uninstall nginx

    09 April 2014

    Install

    cd /usr/local/src
wget http://nginxcp.com/nginxadmin2.3-stable.tar
tar xf nginxadmin2.3-stable.tar
cd publicnginx
./nginxinstaller install
